item.title: Characters not getting saved
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Your code is missing a }

You have an opening { , but no closing }

[code]
/*
if(command.startsWith(“offpickup”) && playerRights > 0 || command.startsWith(“pickupoff”) && playerRights > 0) { // Opening one
talk("["+playerName+"] - picking up items disabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods).");
server.pickup = false; // Where is the closing one?

*/ [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Characters not getting saved
item.dc:creator: @i_kickass_i i kickass i
item.description:
@i_kickass_i wrote:

ok so i have the dangerscape source, and everytime i change the command like the playerRioghts, i start getting errors in the server cmd whenever i log in, which resets my character. now ive gona trhough every command apparntly this caused an error

[QUOTE]if(command.startsWith(“onpickup”) && playerRights > 0 || command.startsWith(“pickupon”) && playerRights > 0){
talk("["+playerName+"] - picking up items enabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods).");
server.pickup = true;
}
if(command.startsWith(“offpickup”) && playerRights > 0 || command.startsWith(“pickupoff”) && playerRights > 0){
talk("["+playerName+"] - picking up items disabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods).");
server.pickup = false;
}[/QUOTE]
it all worked untill i did this

[QUOTE]/if(command.startsWith(“offpickup”) && playerRights > 0 || command.startsWith(“pickupoff”) && playerRights > 0){
talk("["+playerName+"] - picking up items disabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods).");
server.pickup = false;}/[/QUOTE]i commented it out compiled then go this error

[QUOTE]Voule Auto restart
Could not find process: java
Restarting server
online
Connection from 127.0.0.1:------
For input string: “0 -1 0”
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “0 -1 0”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at client.loadgame(client.java:11493)
at client.run(client.java:19449)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Game saved for player 3322
ClientHandler: Client 3322 disconnected (127.0.0.1)
[/QUOTE] but when i changed it back it still didnt work, any advice?

Read full topic
